author: awiner
msg: Implementation of external template libraries, patch from Lev Epshteyn with a bunch of subsequent changes:
- Added caching of parsed documents via TemplateLibraryFactory class
- Added support for library-level <JavaScript> and <Style> elements
- Relative URL support for template libraries
- Use a specific TemplateParserException class instead of adding another GadgetException constant
- A bunch more tests, including end-to-end
- support multiple template libraries per document
- support per-tag script and style content

author: sisbell
